Scale the 2D sketch Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the given coordinate system, euler angles, and translation vector. Extrude the 3D model Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction with a depth of 0.0357 units. The final shape is a simple, white, three-dimensional object with a hole in the center, appearing to be a flat, rectangular shape with a rounded corner. The hole is circular and located in the center of the object, and the object is symmetrical along the vertical axis. The length is approximately 0.75 units, the width is approximately 0.0357 units, and the height is approximately 0.75 units.</description>
